entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 17. POP 30%
entry.summary: Becoming cloudy this morning with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming southeast 20 late this afternoon. High minus 17. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 27. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind south 30 km/h. Low minus 27. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 40 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Thursday 09 March 2023
